title: Getting Started with React.js
excerpt: Learn the basics of React components and hooks
content: React is a popular JavaScript library for building user interfaces. In this guide, we'll cover components, JSX, state management, and hooks like useState and useEffect.

title: Node.js REST API Tutorial
excerpt: Build a complete RESTful API with Express.js
content: Learn how to create a REST API using Node.js and Express. We'll cover routing, middleware, error handling, and connecting to databases.

title: CSS Grid vs Flexbox
excerpt: When to use Grid and when to use Flexbox
content: Both CSS Grid and Flexbox are powerful layout systems. Grid is ideal for two-dimensional layouts, while Flexbox works better for one-dimensional layouts.
